issue.title: [C++] Fix ASAN stack traces in CI
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13027](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13027). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It appears that ASAN wants the symbolizer to be named `llvm-symbolizer` and not `llvm-symbolizer-12` which is what Ubuntu puts on the path.  We can fix this by giving the path to /usr/lib/llvm-12/bin/llvm-symbolizer.
